meanings: 법률 special economic zone for specialized regional development
법률 plan for a special economic zone for specialized regional development

vlive.korean: 저한테 특화된 그런 방송들을 많이... A lot of broadcasts that are specialized for me... 듣기 View video SF9 : ㆍ
vlive.english: A lot of broadcasts that are specialized for me...

vlive.korean: 역시 특화돼 있어. She is already specialized in it. 듣기 View video Dispatch : “잔망 폭격기, 마마무” 움직이는 HD포토
vlive.english: She is already specialized in it.

vlive.korean: 저희 엄마의 그 특화된 소스가 있어요. My mom has her own recipe. 듣기 View video V Beauty : [경선] 가을에 사용하기 좋은 쿠션 모음! Fall Cusion Foundation
vlive.english: My mom has her own recipe.

vlive.korean: 특화된 돌연변이 인간을 만들었다는 정보가 있었어. humans to use as weapons. 듣기 View video 웹드라마 더블루씨(the BlueSea) : 더블루씨(the Blue Sea) 3화 - 심쿵
그 옷에 특화되게 입을 수 있게 몸을 똑같이 만들어야지. You should be made him the same. 듣기 View video VIXX : [Replay] VIXX HYUK & LEO & HONGBIN’s 빅스 혁&레오&홍빈 X 같이먹어요
vlive.english: You should be made him the same.

examples.korean: This product specializes in defrizzifing hair. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 이 제품은 머리의 곱슬거림을 제거하는 데 특화되었다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: This product specializes in defrizzifing hair. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: This new vacuum cleaner is specialized for the carperimeter. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 새 진공청소기는 청소가 잘 안 되는 카펫의 부분을 청소하는 데 특화되어 있다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: This new vacuum cleaner is specialized for the carperimeter. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: a specialized rashie for windsurfing 듣기 Add to Wordbook 윈드서핑에 특화된 래시가드 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: a specialized rashie for windsurfing Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: On the other hand, more specialized soldiers will be needed. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 반면에, 더 많은 특화된 군인들이 필요할 것이다. Neungyule
examples.english: On the other hand, more specialized soldiers will be needed. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It was one of the first specialized channels on American television. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그것은 미국 TV 사상 최초로 특화된 채널들 중 하나였다. Neungyule
examples.english: It was one of the first specialized channels on American television. Add to Wordbook
